_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_QR_getTasks
_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.userAssignee,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!userAssignee
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskStatusId
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: ri!fields,
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

_a-0000ec6b-e6c2-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_isMarkNotNeededDisabled

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_filterRecords
_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD(
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskId: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskRefId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskRefId,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskName: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskName,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskDesc: ri!templateTask.taskDesc,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskBehaviorTypeId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskBehaviorType.taskBehaviorTypeId,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskCategoryId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskCategory.taskCategoryId,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.groupAssignee: ri!templateTask.groupAssignee,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.userAssignee: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskStatusId: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskDocUploadId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.docUploadContext.taskRefDocUploadContextId,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.availableDatetime: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.dueDate: if(
    ri!calculateDueDate = true,
    rule!AS_GSS_TMG_BL_getDueDateBasedOnDuration(templateTask: ri!templateTask),
    null
  ),
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.duration: ri!templateTask.duration,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.durationUnit: ri!templateTask.durationUnit,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.noOfDaysFromStart: ri!templateTask.noOfDaysFromStart,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.completedBy: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.completedDatetime: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: null,
  recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: null
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTasks
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorTypeCode",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!behaviorTypeCode
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorSubtypeCode",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!behaviorSubtypeCode
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskStatus.taskStatusId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskStatusIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskRefId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskRefIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskCategory.categoryName",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!categoryNames
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "userAssignee",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!userAssignees
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  if(
    ri!returnType = cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    rule!AS_GSS_UT_QueryFullEntity(
      entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_TASK,
      entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
      filters: local!filters,
      logicalExpression: { ri!logicalExpressions },
      querySelection: ri!querySelection,
      excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
      executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      sort: a!defaultValue(ri!sort, ri!pagingInfo.sort),
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
      returnType: ri!returnType,
      entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_TASK,
      entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
      filters: local!filters,
      logicalExpression: { ri!logicalExpressions },
      pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
      excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
      executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
      sort: ri!sort,
      aggregation: ri!aggregation
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ea82-c8e1-8000-9cb9-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_GRD_EvaluationRecordList

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_evaluationLandingPage
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!loggedInUser: loggedInUser(),
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_EVALUATIONS_IN_HOME_PAGE
  ),
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isEvaluator: rule!AS_GSS_BL_determineIfUserIsEvaluator(loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser),
  local!evaluations: rule!AS_GSS_BL_returnEvaluationInfoForLandingPage(
    loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
    executeWhen: true(),
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!canUserCreateEvalaution: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getVisibilityToCreateEvaluation(user: local!loggedInUser),
  local!isHomePage: true(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_evaluationsLandingPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_landingPageHeader(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      showCreateEvaluationAction: and(
        local!canUserCreateEvalaution,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: local!evaluations.data)
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      /*My Active Evaluations*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeEvaluations(
        evaluations: local!evaluations,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        showCreateEvaluationAction: local!canUserCreateEvalaution
      ),
      /*My Tasks*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeTasks(
        selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
        user: local!loggedInUser,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: local!isHomePage,
        showWhen: true(),
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

_a-0000ec6b-e6c2-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_DSP_recordActionReassign

_a-0000ec6b-e6c2-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
  label: "Tasks",
  labelSize: "SMALL",
  labelColor: "STANDARD",
  labelHeadingTag: "H2",
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
      contents: {
        rule!AS_GSS_TMG_SBS_runtimeTaskToolbarForActiveTasks(
          i18nData: ri!i18nData,
          selectedTasks: ri!selectedTasks,
          user: ri!user,
          isHomePage: ri!isHomePage
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_GRD_activeTasks(
          isHomePage: ri!isHomePage,
          user: ri!user,
          isEvaluator: ri!isEvaluator,
          i18nData: ri!i18nData,
          selectedTasks: ri!selectedTasks,
          triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
          accessibilityText: "Controls above the table become enabled when checkboxes in the table are checked"
        )
      },
      height: "AUTO",
      style: "NONE",
      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      padding: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD",
      showBorder: false,
      showShadow: true
    )
  },
  showWhen: ri!showWhen
)

_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getCriteriaAssignment
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!assignee,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!assignee)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getRuntimeTask
_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_TASK,
  excludeNestedCdts:ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorTypeCode",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!behaviorTypeCode
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorSubtypeCode",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!behaviorSubtypeCode
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!evaluationId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskStatus.taskStatusId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskStatusIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskRefId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskRefIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskCategory.categoryName",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!categoryName
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "userAssignee",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!userAssignee
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!additionalLogicalExpressions
    },
    
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationByIdentifier

  recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(),
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier(
    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
    identifier: ri!evaluationId,
    executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    fields: ri!fields,
    relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
  )
)

_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_sendEmailProcessParameters
_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!fontDetails: rule!AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_wrapper(),
  {
    ccRecipient: ri!ccRecipient,
    closing: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closing,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_ThankYou",
        arguments: ","
      )
    ),
    closingSender: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closingSender,
      default: "Source Selection Admin"
    ),
    content: ri!content,
    greeting: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!greeting,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_Hello",
        arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnUserFirstName(username: ri!sendTo) & ","
      )
    ),
    sendTo: ri!sendTo,
    subject: ri!subject,
    fontFamily: index(local!fontDetails, "fontFamily", null),
    fontSize: index(local!fontDetails, "fontSize", null),
    backgroundColor: index(
      local!fontDetails,
      "backgroundColor",
      null
    ),
    fontColor: index(local!fontDetails, "fontColor", null)
  }
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e70f-2824-8000-9c01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
_a-0000e70f-2824-8000-9c01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:

  typeof(a!flatten(ri!records)),
  filter(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zInternal_filterRecordByFieldValue_Multiple(
      record: _,
      field: ri!field,
      values: ri!values
    ),
    a!flatten(ri!records)
  )
)

0002e2d7-0c89-8000-f92f-7f0000014e7a-tmg.name: AS GSS TMG Task Action Audit

_a-0000ea13-fcbd-8000-9c86-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getCriteria

_a-0000ec6b-e6c2-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_BL_returnEvaluationAdditionalInfoForCards

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_round

_a-0000ec6b-e6c2-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_DSP_recordActionsMarkComplete

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_constructLPTATask
_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!taskRefData: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskRefs(
    taskRefId: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_TASK_REF_ID_COMPLETE_LPTA_TASK,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  local!defaultFactor: rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords(
    records: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
    fieldValuePairs: {
      a!map(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        value: true
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isDefaultEntry,
        value: true
      )
    }
  ),
  local!defaultFactorAssignments: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
    records: ri!factorOrSubFactorAssignments,
    field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
    values: index(
      local!defaultFactor,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      0
    )
  ),
  local!assignedEvaluators: touniformstring(
    index(
      local!defaultFactorAssignments,
      recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee,
      null
    )
  ),
  local!assignToCO: or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!assignedEvaluators),
    count(local!assignedEvaluators) > 1
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
    records: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_mapTaskRefToRuntimeTaskRecord(taskRef: local!taskRefData),
    modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD(
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId: null,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId: index(
        local!defaultFactor,
        recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
        {}
      ),
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskName: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber] & " - " & cons!AS_GSS_TXT_TASK_NAME_FOR_LPTA,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskDesc: cons!AS_GSS_TXT_TASK_DESC_FOR_LPTA,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.userAssignee: if(
        local!assignToCO,
        ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingOfficer],
        local!assignedEvaluators
      ),
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.groupAssignee: null,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.dueDate: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.availableDatetime: now(),
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_ASSIGNED,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy: ri!initiator,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime: now(),
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
    )
  )
)
